overview: Three ex-Navy Seals living in a small Texas town uncover corrupt police officers. They soon discover corruption that leads higher up the chain as high as government officials. Only for each ex-Navy Seal to be murdered one by one. But not before Karl Mackey {Michael Harrison Bendall}, leads the entire police force on a high speed chase after gathering enough evidense to expose the corruption that brings justice back to their town.
title: In Service to America
